name: Baseless
storyline:
Blast from planet to planet with 360° gravity, creatively demolishing every enemy in your path towards saving your family. Fire powerful weapons, adopt cute friends, and discover a galaxy worth fighting for. Propel yourself across a planet’s surface. Aim your gun at the ground to blast off, and continue thrusting yourself through space. Improvise and master your skills to survive! Combine all your moves to shoot, slash, dash, block, and BLAST the enemies to bits!

Use your bubble shield to deflect incoming projectiles before dashing into the action! Stun an enemy with your sword and then blow them to bits with an explosive barrel! Chain together your grappling hook and shotgun to bring the pain closer! A deep moveset allows for satisfying mechanical mastery.
summary: Baseless is a challenging planet-jumping shooter that defies gravity. Shooting = Movement: blast from planet to planet with 360° gravity, creatively demolishing every enemy in your path to save your family. Fire powerful weapons, adopt cute friends, and discover a galaxy worth fighting for!
